description:
Beat the wintery forecase in warm, water-repellent bib tights. The PI Dry technology sheds moisture throughout the lifespan of the garment, and the stretchy fleece keeps your leg muscles warm while you power through your hill climbs. The plush chamois provides comfort on long rides and side cargo pockets keep essentials close at hand.z

  • Stretchy thermal fleece is warm, breathable and wicks away excess moisture
  • Water-resistant PI Dry® treatment sheds splashes and light rain
  • Reduced seams and stretchy fabric for fit and comfort
  • Wide bib straps provide stability and support
  • Drop-tail strap design allows nature breaks without need for zippers
  • Levitate™ Plus chamois for all-day comfort
  • Reflective elements for low light visibility
name: Pearl Izumi Expedition Thermal Cycling Bib Tights - Men's
